text: aur yadi tum unhen haath lagaane se pahale talaaq de do, kintu usaka mahr- nishchit kar chuke ho, to jo mahrah tumane nishchit kiya hai usaka aadha ada karana hoga, yah aur baat hai ki ve svayan chhod de ya purush jisake haath mein vivaah ka sootr hai, vah narmee se kaam le (aur mahr poora ada kar de) . aur yah ki tum narmee se kaam lo to yah parahezagaaree se zyaada qareeb hai aur tum ek-doosare ko haq se badhakar dena na bhoolo. nishchay hee allaah use dekh raha hai, jo tum karate ho
